summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records inmate counts by unit and includes signatures of correctional officers, serving as an official administrative record of the prison population at that time.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total population of 736 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: Document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated August 9, 2019.
Records inmate counts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, with a total count of 736 inmates.
Shows counts by specific housing units (e.g., B-A: 26, C-A: 10, Z-A: 75, Z-B: 5).
Includes sections for correctional officers to print names and sign, verifying the count.
Serves as an administrative prison record, not directly detailing events related to Jeffrey Epstein's case but from the facility where he was held.
